languages.text: {n}Глаза Торианы широко распахиваются.{/n} "Нет, Ваша Милость! Мой род подвел вас, мы сами поставили свою лояльность под сомнение... Некоторые члены моего дома, напуганные заслуженной карой, могли лишь скулить о своей судьбе. Я слежу за тем, чтобы их скулеж оставался пустыми словами, и род Гапрак смог снова заслужить ваше расположение".

traits.locale_text: {n}Глаза Торианы широко распахиваются.{/n} "Нет, Ваша Милость! Мой род подвел вас, мы сами поставили свою лояльность под сомнение... Некоторые члены моего дома, напуганные заслуженной карой, могли лишь скулить о своей судьбе. Я слежу за тем, чтобы их скулеж оставался пустыми словами, и род Гапрак смог снова заслужить ваше расположение".

languages.text: {n}Toriana's eyes widen.{/n} "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! My family failed you — it was because of our own actions that our loyalty was called into question... I admit that there are some in my house who were daunted by this fair punishment and chose to lament their fate instead of working to clear the family name. I am taking steps to ensure that their lamentations remain nothing more than empty whining and that House Gaprak may one day earn back your favour."
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза Торианы широко распахиваются.{/n} "Нет, Ваша Милость! Мой род подвел вас, мы сами поставили свою лояльность под сомнение... Я слежу за тем, чтобы их скулеж оставался пустыми словами, и род Гапрак смог снова заслужить ваше расположение".

I admit that there are some in my house who were daunted by this fair punishment and chose to lament their fate instead of working to clear the family name. I am taking steps to ensure that their lamentations remain nothing more than empty whining and that House Gaprak may one day earn back your favour."

I am taking steps to ensure that their lamentations remain nothing more than empty whining and that House Gaprak may one day earn back your favour."

I admit that there are some in my house who were daunted by this fair punishment and chose to lament their fate instead of working to clear the family name. {n}Toriana's eyes widen.{/n} "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! My family failed you — it was because of our own actions that our loyalty was called into question... I admit that there are some in my house who were daunted by this fair punishment and chose to lament their fate instead of working to clear the family name. I am taking steps to ensure that their lamentations remain nothing more than empty whining and that House Gaprak may one day earn back your favour."

languages.text: {n}托丽安娜瞪大了眼睛。{/n}“不，大人！我的家族确实辜负了您的信任。由于我们自己行事不当，我们的忠诚遭到了质疑……我承认，家族的一部分人被这公平的惩处摧垮了。他们没有努力为家族正名，却反而哀叹自己的命运。我正在努力采取措施，确保他们的长吁短叹不会造成任何实质性的后果。我也同样在不断努力，希望有朝一日，贾帕克家族能重新赢得您的青睐。”
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana's eyes widen.{/n} "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! My family failed you — it was because of our own actions that our loyalty was called into question... I admit that there are some in my house who were daunted by this fair punishment and chose to lament their fate instead of working to clear the family name. I am taking steps to ensure that their lamentations remain nothing more than empty whining and that House Gaprak may one day earn back your favour."

traits.locale_text: {n}托丽安娜瞪大了眼睛。{/n}“不，大人！我的家族确实辜负了您的信任。由于我们自己行事不当，我们的忠诚遭到了质疑……我承认，家族的一部分人被这公平的惩处摧垮了。他们没有努力为家族正名，却反而哀叹自己的命运。我正在努力采取措施，确保他们的长吁短叹不会造成任何实质性的后果。我也同样在不断努力，希望有朝一日，贾帕克家族能重新赢得您的青睐。”

languages.text: {n}Torianas Augen weiten sich.{/n} "Nein, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Meine Familie hat Euch enttäuscht. Unsere Loyalität wurde unseres eigenen Handelns wegen in Frage gestellt ... Ich gebe zu, dass es in meinem Haus einige gibt, die entsetzt ob dieser gerechten Strafe waren und lieber über ihr Schicksal klagen, als dazu beizutragen, den Namen der Familie reinzuwaschen. Ich unternehme Schritte, um dafür zu sorgen, dass ihre Klagen nichts weiter als leeres Geschimpfe bleiben und dass Haus Gaprak eines Tages Eure Gunst zurückgewinnen kann."
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana's eyes widen.{/n} "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! My family failed you — it was because of our own actions that our loyalty was called into question... I admit that there are some in my house who were daunted by this fair punishment and chose to lament their fate instead of working to clear the family name. I am taking steps to ensure that their lamentations remain nothing more than empty whining and that House Gaprak may one day earn back your favour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Torianas Augen weiten sich.{/n} "Nein, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Meine Familie hat Euch enttäuscht. Unsere Loyalität wurde unseres eigenen Handelns wegen in Frage gestellt ... Ich gebe zu, dass es in meinem Haus einige gibt, die entsetzt ob dieser gerechten Strafe waren und lieber über ihr Schicksal klagen, als dazu beizutragen, den Namen der Familie reinzuwaschen. Ich unternehme Schritte, um dafür zu sorgen, dass ihre Klagen nichts weiter als leeres Geschimpfe bleiben und dass Haus Gaprak eines Tages Eure Gunst zurückgewinnen kann."

languages.text: {n}Toriana écarquille les yeux.{/n} « Non, Votre Seigneurie ! Ma famille ne s'est pas montrée à la hauteur de vos attentes. Si notre loyauté a été remise en question, c'est à cause de nos propres agissements... J'admets que certains des miens ont eu du mal à accepter ce juste châtiment et ont préféré se lamenter sur leur sort plutôt que d'œuvrer à rétablir notre réputation, mais je peux vous assurer que ce ne sont rien de plus que des jérémiades et que la maison Gaprak n'a qu'un seul et unique objectif : regagner un jour vos faveurs. »
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana's eyes widen.{/n} "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! My family failed you — it was because of our own actions that our loyalty was called into question... I admit that there are some in my house who were daunted by this fair punishment and chose to lament their fate instead of working to clear the family name. I am taking steps to ensure that their lamentations remain nothing more than empty whining and that House Gaprak may one day earn back your favour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Toriana écarquille les yeux.{/n} « Non, Votre Seigneurie ! Ma famille ne s'est pas montrée à la hauteur de vos attentes. Si notre loyauté a été remise en question, c'est à cause de nos propres agissements... J'admets que certains des miens ont eu du mal à accepter ce juste châtiment et ont préféré se lamenter sur leur sort plutôt que d'œuvrer à rétablir notre réputation, mais je peux vous assurer que ce ne sont rien de plus que des jérémiades et que la maison Gaprak n'a qu'un seul et unique objectif : regagner un jour vos faveurs. »

languages.text: {n}Toriana abre los ojos de par en par.{/n} «¡Nunca, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Mi familia le falló y fueron nuestras acciones las que pusieron nuestra lealtad en entredicho... Admito que algunos miembros de nuestra casa quedaron conmocionados por el merecido castigo que recibimos y eligieron lamentarse en vez de trabajar para limpiar el buen nombre de la familia. Estoy tomando medidas para que sus lamentos sigan siendo solo quejas baladíes y para que la casa Gaprak pueda algún día recuperar su favor».
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana's eyes widen.{/n} "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! My family failed you — it was because of our own actions that our loyalty was called into question... I admit that there are some in my house who were daunted by this fair punishment and chose to lament their fate instead of working to clear the family name. I am taking steps to ensure that their lamentations remain nothing more than empty whining and that House Gaprak may one day earn back your favour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Toriana abre los ojos de par en par.{/n} «¡Nunca, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Mi familia le falló y fueron nuestras acciones las que pusieron nuestra lealtad en entredicho... Admito que algunos miembros de nuestra casa quedaron conmocionados por el merecido castigo que recibimos y eligieron lamentarse en vez de trabajar para limpiar el buen nombre de la familia. Estoy tomando medidas para que sus lamentos sigan siendo solo quejas baladíes y para que la casa Gaprak pueda algún día recuperar su favor».

languages.text: {n}トリアーナは目を見開いた。{/n}「陛下、違います！私の家族は…あなた自身の行動のせいで、私らの忠誠心が疑われたんです。確かに、この公正な罰に怯え、家名を晴らす努力をせず、自分の運命を嘆くことを選んだ者も家族の中にはいます。だから私は、彼らの嘆きが空疎な泣き言に過ぎないことを確実にします。そして、ギャプラック家がいるかあなた方の信頼を取り戻せるよう、手を尽くしています」
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana's eyes widen.{/n} "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! My family failed you — it was because of our own actions that our loyalty was called into question... I admit that there are some in my house who were daunted by this fair punishment and chose to lament their fate instead of working to clear the family name. I am taking steps to ensure that their lamentations remain nothing more than empty whining and that House Gaprak may one day earn back your favour."

traits.locale_text: {n}トリアーナは目を見開いた。{/n}「陛下、違います！私の家族は…あなた自身の行動のせいで、私らの忠誠心が疑われたんです。確かに、この公正な罰に怯え、家名を晴らす努力をせず、自分の運命を嘆くことを選んだ者も家族の中にはいます。だから私は、彼らの嘆きが空疎な泣き言に過ぎないことを確実にします。そして、ギャプラック家がいるかあなた方の信頼を取り戻せるよう、手を尽くしています」

languages.text: {n}Toriana'nın gözleri açılıyor.{/n} "Olur mu {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri? Hanem, yüzünüzü kara çıkarmıştır. Sadakatimizin şüpheye düşmesi, kendi yaptıklarımızdan mütevellittir... Verdiğiniz adil cezayı kendilerine yediremeyen ve hanemizin adına sürülen lekeyi temizlemeye çabalamak yerine kaderine isyan edenler olmuştur, evet. Ancak bu isyanların boş laflardan öteye gitmemesi ve Gaprak Hanesi'nin bir gün güveninizi tekrar kazanabilmesi için uğraşıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana's eyes widen.{/n} "No, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! My family failed you — it was because of our own actions that our loyalty was called into question... I admit that there are some in my house who were daunted by this fair punishment and chose to lament their fate instead of working to clear the family name. I am taking steps to ensure that their lamentations remain nothing more than empty whining and that House Gaprak may one day earn back your favour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Toriana'nın gözleri açılıyor.{/n} "Olur mu {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Hanem yüzünüzü kara çıkarmıştır. Sadakatimizin şüpheye düşmesi, kendi yaptıklarımızdan mütevellittir... Verdiğiniz adil cezayı kendilerine yediremeyip kaderine isyan edenler olmuştur, evet. Keşke hanemizin adına sürülen lekeyi temizlemeye çabalasalardı. Ancak bu isyanların boş laflardan öteye gitmeyeceğinden ve Gaprak Hanesi'nin bir gün güveninizi tekrar kazanacağından emin olmak için çalışıyorum."
